channel.title: Optimization on Code-Chimp

item.title: Switching to Fetch API
item.author: tim@code-chimp.com (Tim Goshinski)
item.description: I have finally made the decision to let go of one of my favorite NPM packages, Axios, in favor of modern browsers' Fetch API. I want to be clear up front - I find nothing wrong with Axios, it is an extremely high quality package and a natural progression having used Angular’s http service that it was originally based upon. I will likely still rely on Axios in NodeJS projects, but times change and it now seems a bit redundant in front-end client applications.
